# World Photos â€” Interactive Travel Map

This is a plain HTML/CSS/JS project (no bundler, no framework).

- **Map library:** Leaflet.js (loaded via CDN)
- **Timeline slider:** noUiSlider (loaded via CDN)
- **Tile provider:** CartoDB Dark Matter
- **Data:** `photos.json` generated by `extract_exif.py` (Python 3 + Pillow)
- Photos live in the `images/` folder and must contain EXIF GPS + DateTaken metadata.
- The app is a single-page static site; serve with any local HTTP server.
